DOC.criteria: At birth : Healthy , term ( 3742 week ) infant Weight length 10th 90th percentile accord National Center Health Statistics ( NCHS ) growth chart At time enrollment : < = 21 day postnatal age Weight length 10th 90th percentile accord National Center Health Statistics ( NCHS ) growth chart Exclusively formula feed Written inform consent parent/guardian At time enrollment : partially humanmilk feed ; feed baby/solid food Conditions require feeding specify protocol Documented suspect cow 's milk allergy and/or soy protein allergy Major congenital deformity Suspected document systemic congenital infection Evidence cardiac , respiratory , hematological , gastrointestinal , systemic disease Participation clinical trial
